QueryDefinition.Query: select staffid as PROVIDER_ID, cast(Right(cast(staffid as varchar), 3) as int) as CARE_SITE_ID, cast(staffid as varchar) as PROVIDER_SOURCE_VALUE, cast(ISNULL(role, 0) as varchar) as SPECIALTY_SOURCE_VALUE, cast(ISNULL(role, 0) as varchar) as SPECIALTY_SOURCE_KEY, ISNULL(gender, 0) as gender from {sc}.Staff
